name: The Alphabet
tagline: I for one welcome our new Alphabet overlords
body:
After [the announcement](http://www.theregister.co.uk/2015/08/10/google_alphabet/) that Google is now one of many corporations housed under the wing of the newly-created [Alphabet corporation](http://abc.xyz), I reached out to some of my friends to help out compile a useful list of possible company names to fill out this new alphabet. After all, you can't really have an alphabet with only one letter (*technically you can, but it would make for a very boring language ~~ ed.*)

We hope this list will be useful to Page and Brin in their quest to make cool things!

* **Aperture Science**.
Also Abstergo Industries or Alchemax
* **Buy n Large**.
Blue Sun is also a fine name, or even BiffCo Enterprises
* **Cyberdyne Systems**.
Maybe Cobra or Cloverleaf Industries?
* **Dharma Initiative**
* **EvilCorp**
* **Fontaine Futuristics**
* **Hyperion Corp.**
* **InGen**.
Can never go wrong with IniTech, if you're going for that business-y feel.
* **J Corp**
* **KAOS**
* **LexCorp**.
Los Pollos Hermanos if you prefer something more brotherly.
* **M.A.D.**. 
A bunch of great options for M: M.A.R.S. Industries, MomCorp, or Multi-National United, all of which really encompass future and unity.
* **New Path**
* **OCP**
* **Primatech**
* **Quantum**
* **Roxxon**.
Rekall is a great option too, more tech-oriented.
* **SPECTRE**.
Soylent would have been the preferred choice, but it's already taken. Shinra could appeal to the Asian markets.
* **Tyrell Corporation**.
We hope to see some good cybernetic organisms out of T!
* **Umbrella Corp.**
* **Value-Tec**.
Versalife or Virtucon would also work here.
* **Weyland-Yutani**
* **Xanatos Enterprises**
* **Yoyodyne Propulsion Systems**
* **Zorg Industries**

*~~ lobsters et al*
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
